name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.HasLocalization.hL
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
self : W.HasLocalization
⊢ CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.HasLocalization.L.IsLocalization W
decl:
/-- The data of a localized category with a given universe
for the morphisms. -/
class HasLocalization where
  /-- the objects of the localized category. -/
  {D : Type u}
  /-- the category structure. -/
  [hD : Category.{w} D]
  /-- the localization functor. -/
  L : C ⥤ D
  [hL : L.IsLocalization W]
